title: 2 Set 15.7'' Gold Circle Mirrors Wall Decor Iron Frame Mirrors Art Round Home Hanging Mirrors for Living Room/Bedroom/Bathroom/Entryway (Medium Size 15.7 inch)
descriptions:
Title: 2 Set 15.7" Gold Circle Mirrors Wall Decor – Modern Artistic Round Wall Art

Overview:
Elevate your space with this set of two gold circle mirrors featuring a unique “circle on circles” design. Modern, artistic, and versatile, these mirrors add depth, light, and sculptural elegance to living rooms, bedrooms, bathrooms, entryways, and office spaces. Style them as a pair, mix into a gallery wall, or layer with paintings, wall sculptures, or candle sconces for a curated look.

Key Features:
- Set of 2: Perfect for symmetrical styling or creative arrangements.
- Statement Design: Circle-on-circles silhouette blends art and function.
- Ideal Size: 15.7" diameter with frame; 10" mirror surface for balanced presence.
- Premium Materials: Sturdy iron frame in a refined gold finish (between matte and bright).
- Crystal-Clear Reflection: High-quality annealed glass delivers HD imaging and resists warping and distortion.
- Lightweight & Easy Hang: Each mirror weighs approximately 2 lb and mounts with a single screw.
- Versatile Styling: Complements modern, contemporary, glam, and eclectic decor styles.
- Thoughtful Packaging: Decent protective packaging helps ensure safe delivery.

Specifications:
- Quantity: 2 mirrors
- Overall Diameter (with frame): 15.7 inches
- Mirror-Only Diameter: 10 inches
- Frame Material: Iron
- Frame Color/Finish: Gold, semi-matte sheen
- Glass: High-quality annealed glass, HD clarity
- Weight (each): approx. 2 lb
- Mounting: Single-screw hanging

Where to Use:
- Living room: Above the sofa, near a picture wall, or over the TV.
- Bedroom: Over nightstands or as a paired accent above a dresser.
- Bathroom: As decorative accents outside of wet zones.
- Entryway: Create a welcoming focal point with light and dimension.
- Office: Add modern flair and brighten workspaces.

Styling Ideas:
- Pair with framed art for a layered gallery wall.
- Flank a console table or mantle for balanced symmetry.
- Combine with wall sculptures or candle sconces for added texture and glow.
- Stagger heights to enhance vertical interest and flow.

What’s Included:
- 2 x Gold circle mirrors (15.7" with frame, 10" mirror surface)
- Easy single-screw hanging compatibility (hardware not included)

Bring modern artistry and luminous charm to your walls with this elegant two-piece gold mirror set, designed to mix, match, and elevate any room with ease.
